message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $82. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $75?
I understand you're still looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I can sell the product to you for $79. It's a great value, and I think you'll really love it.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $78?
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can sell the product to you for $79.50. It's the best I can do, and I think it's still a great value.
